Home.operationGreenVeilDescription: An initiative focused on transforming complex vegetation data into practical insights using AI.
Home.operationGreenVeilIntro: Our database, primarily focused on Kosovo's agriculture, contains extensive labeled multispectral data used to train our model, which predicts specific indicators related to crop health and field conditions. This is a crucial tool to help farmers save on resource and therefore expenses while also ensuring better quality and yield.
Home.operationGreenVeilDetails: Through advanced processing, we translate vegetation indices (e.g. NDVI, SAVI, IPVI), cumulative Growing Degree Days (GDDs), and historical rainfall and temperature data into actionable insights. The resulting information includes the following indicators and more:
Home.operationGreenVeilIndicator1: Nitrogen Level (Relative or Probability of Deficiency)
Home.operationGreenVeilIndicator1Details: Indicates nitrogen levels, crucial for growth. Deficiencies target fertilization adjustments.
Home.operationGreenVeilIndicator2: Hydration Status (Probability or Scale of Deficit)
Home.operationGreenVeilIndicator2Details: Shows irrigation needs; high deficit probabilities suggest increased watering, while low levels indicate optimal hydration.
Home.operationGreenVeilIndicator3Details: Projects yield as a percentage of potential maximum.
Home.operationGreenVeilIndicator4Details: Warns of potential pest or disease issues, based on stress indicators and regional data.
